Text.jp: Recover a little happiness by offering one to a grumpy client.
Text.sc: 给脾气暴躁的顾客一根能量条，会恢复一点点满意度。

Text.jp: Help more clients get fit! One more chair means one more person waiting to work out!
Text.sc: 帮助更多的顾客健身！又一张椅子，意味着又一人等着开工！

Text.jp: Speeds up all workouts. Give your clients their second wind!
Text.sc: 加快所有训练。给你的顾客们带来复苏之风！

Text.jp: Install an extra shower station to avoid those long lines.
Text.sc: 安装一间额外的淋浴室，以避免排长队。

Text.jp: What's better than one relaxation station? Two relaxation stations!
Text.sc: 有什么比一处放松点要好呢？两处放松点！

Text.jp: Clients are more likely to give tips.
Text.sc: 顾客更有可能给予小费。
顾客在设备上训练加快5%。

Text.jp: Add a robot trainer to help train clients!
Text.sc: 添加机器人教练来帮助训练顾客！
顾客在设备上训练加快10%。

Text.jp: Broken machines are no match for this robot!
Text.sc: 损坏的机器也不是这种机器人的对手！

Text.jp: Need more clients? This robot is here to help!
Text.sc: 需要更多客户吗？这种机器人可以帮上大忙！

Text.jp: This is your Star Bar. It shows how many bonus stars you've collected and how many you need to earn your next bonus.
Text.sc: 这是你的星条。其显示了你已收集了多少颗奖励星星，以及你接下来要收集多少奖励。
让我们开始第一个关卡吧！

Text.jp: Hover over sections to learn more.
Text.sc: 将鼠标悬停在上面了解更多信息。

Text.jp: This is the best score for this level.
Text.sc: 这是该关卡的最佳得分。

Text.jp: Let's wait for our first client to arrive!
Text.sc: 让我们等待第一位顾客的到来吧！

Text.jp: Select and drag the client to the machine they want.
Text.sc: 选择并拖动顾客到他们想要的机器上。

Text.jp: The client wants to use this machine.
Text.sc: 顾客想要使用这台机器。

Text.jp: Clients begin exercising without any help.
Text.sc: 顾客在没有任何帮助的情况下开始锻炼。

Text.jp: But you can press this button to help train them.
Text.sc: 但你可以按这个按钮来帮忙训练他们。

Text.jp: Wait for the client to finish exercising.
To quickly send a client to the shower, just right-click.
Text.sc: 要快速送顾客前去淋浴，只需单击右键。

Text.jp: You'll make a great personal trainer!
Text.sc: 你将会成为一名出色的私人教练！

Text.jp: You've earned enough stars to receive your first bonus!
Text.sc: 你已获得足够的星星来赢取你的第一桶奖金！

Text.jp: Let's activate it so you can use it during the next level.
Text.sc: 让我们来激活它，这样你就可以在下一关卡中使用它了。

Text.jp: Then select the first empty slot.
Want to speed up your clients?
This misting fan keeps clients cool, helping them train faster.
Text.sc: 这种喷雾风扇可以让顾客保持凉爽，帮助他们更加快速训练。

Text.jp: Let's wait for our first client to arrive.
Text.sc: 让我们等待第一位顾客的到来。

Text.jp: Drag the client to the machine they want to use.
Text.sc: 拖动顾客到他们想使用的机器上。

Text.jp: Wait until the client finishes exercising.
Oh no! We've got another client who wants to use this machine, too.
Text.sc: 哦，不！我们又有一名顾客也想要使用这台机器。

Text.jp: Don't worry! Just select this client...
Text.sc: 不要担心！只要选择这名顾客…

Text.jp: And invite them to sit at the relaxation station!
Text.sc: 并邀请他们坐到放松点！

Text.jp: Remember, clients who are waiting in a relaxation station won't lose any happiness!
Text.sc: 记住，在放松点等待的客户不会降低任何满意度！

Text.jp: The bonus has been charged! Select it to activate it.
Text.sc: 奖励已填充！选择来激活它。

Text.jp: Select the hydration station to fill a water cup.
Text.sc: 选择水化站来装满一杯水。

Text.jp: Wait for the station to finish...
Then send water to the client quickly by right-clicking the hydration station.
Text.sc: 然后右键点击水化站，快速送水到顾客那里。

Text.jp: Keep a full cup handy to rehydrate your clients!
Text.sc: 手头留一杯水，随时供水给顾客！

Text.jp: Sometimes, you'll need help to serve all your clients.
Text.sc: 有时候，你需要帮忙招待所有的顾客。

Text.jp: Press here to hire a new personal trainer.
Text.sc: 按这里聘请一名新的私人教练。

Text.jp: One of your machines has broken down! Select it to send someone to repair it.
Text.sc: 你有一台机器损坏了！选择并派人来修理它。

Text.jp: To complete this goal, you'll need to buy the Punch-Bot machine.
Text.sc: 要达成这个目标，你需要购买穿孔机器人机器。

Text.jp: But we don't have enough money yet, so let's earn some!
Text.sc: 但我们还没有足够的钱，所以让我们来赚一点吧！

Text.jp: When you have enough, just push the button to purchase the new equipment.
Text.sc: 当你有足够钱时，只需轻轻一按，就能购买新的设备。

Text.jp: Great job! Keep completing those goals!
Text.sc: 干得好！继续完成这些目标！

Text.jp: What? There are still people jogging in this city?
Text.sc: 什么？还有人在这个城市里慢跑？

Text.jp: Why are people still exercising if they can just buy our energy pills?
Text.sc: 如果人们购买了我们的能量药丸，为什么还有人再锻炼？

Text.jp: Increase advertising by 200%... and get people out on the streets to offer our product to those fools. Now!
Text.sc: 广告增加200%...让失业的人将我们产品提供给那些傻瓜们。立刻去！
马上去，吉里斯特曼先生！

Text.jp: Ellie, have you noticed that a lot of people in town look a little... worn-out?
Text.sc: 艾莉，你有没有注意到，城里好多人都看起来有点…萎靡不振？

Text.jp: Hello, ladies. Boy, have I got a great offer for you.
Text.sc: 你们好，女士们。伙计，我给你提供一份了不起的好东西。

Text.jp: Try these amazing energy pills for free, and you will never need exercise again.
Text.sc: 免费尝尝这些惊人的能量药丸，从此你就永远不需要再锻炼了。

Text.jp: Thanks, but no thanks. I tried those pills, and they made me feel terrible. I'll stick to exercise.
Text.sc: 谢谢，但不必了。我已经尝过这些药丸了，他们让我觉得很可怕。我会坚持锻炼身体的。

Text.jp: I'm not surprised you felt bad, Daisy. The last thing Mr. Gristleman cares about is making people healthy.
Text.sc: 你感觉如此糟糕我并不感到惊讶，黛西。吉里斯特曼先生最不关心的就是让人们保持健康。

Text.jp: Closed! I bet too many customers went looking for Gristleman's quick fix.
Text.sc: 闭嘴！我敢打赌，有很多顾客在寻找着吉里斯特曼的锦囊密集。

Text.jp: Ellie, I have an idea! It'll make people forget all about Gristleman's pills!
Text.sc: 艾莉，我有个主意！这能够让人忘记所有关于吉里斯特曼药丸的事情！

Text.jp: Mr. Gristleman... Sales growth in this region has stopped. People aren't buying as many of your pills, sir.
Text.sc: 吉里斯特曼先生…这一地区的销售增长已停止了。人们不再购买您的药丸了，先生。

Text.jp: Some local girl opened up two fitness centers. They've become very popular with your... former customers.
Text.sc: 一些本地的女孩子开了两家健身中心。它们非常受到你…以前客户的欢迎。

Text.jp: Impossible! I put all of the fitness centers in town out of business!
Text.sc: 不可能！我让这镇上所有的健身中心都歇业了！

Text.jp: I'll get to the bottom of this. You just keep sending pills to places where sales are still high!
Text.sc: 我会弄清事情真相的。你只要继续将药丸送到销售额仍然很高的地方！

Text.jp: You! You're the one behind all those new fitness centers! Are you trying to put me out of business?
Text.sc: 你！你就是这些新健身中心背后的人！你是不是打算让我破产？

Text.jp: Mr. Gristleman, my name is Daisy. I came here to talk to you about your energy pills.
Text.sc: 吉里斯特曼先生，我的名字叫黛西。我来这里是为了和你谈谈你那能量药丸的事。

Text.jp: People need exercise. Those pills could be dangerous, and they're certainly no substitute for the healthy energy boost you get from a real workout.
Text.sc: 人们需要锻炼。这些药丸会很危险，他们肯定无法代替从真正的锻炼中获得的能量增长。

Text.jp: Perhaps I'll look into it, Miss Daisy. Good-bye.
Text.sc: 也许我会考虑一下的，黛西小姐。再见。

Text.jp: I'll look into shutting you down for good!
Text.sc: 我会考虑永远让你开门大吉！

Text.jp: Albert, have you found out why Daisy's fitness centers are so popular?
Text.sc: 艾伯特，你发现了黛西的健身中心为何如此受欢迎吗？

Text.jp: Yes, sir. Her gyms have a very friendly atmosphere and are equipped with fun and interesting machines. That's apparently why people prefer exercising there to... buying your pills.
Text.sc: 是的，先生。她的健身房有着很融洽的气氛，而且配有好玩又有趣的机器。显然这就是为什么人们更喜欢去那里锻炼…而不是购买您的药丸。

Text.jp: Why is she so against my pills? Find out who helped her. Right now!
Text.sc: 为什么她要如此针对我的药丸？找出是谁在帮她。立刻去！

Text.jp: I found out who's been helping Daisy, Mr. Gristleman. It's some girl named Ellie.
Text.sc: 我发现了是谁一直在帮黛西，吉里斯特曼先生。是某个叫艾莉的女孩。

Text.jp: Yes, sir. One of our pill distributors confirmed it.
Text.sc: 是的，先生。已证实是我们药丸的其中一名分销商。

Text.jp: Poking her nose into my business again, huh? Well, I'll take care of her... and her little friend!
Text.sc: 又来插手我的生意，是吧？很好，我会对付她的…还有她的小朋友！

Text.jp: Great job, Daisy! You've helped so many people stop taking Gristleman's pills.
Text.sc: 干得很好，黛西！你已经帮了很多人戒掉了吉里斯特曼的药丸。

Text.jp: Yeah. I just hope he's not a sore loser...
Text.sc: 嗯。我只是希望他不是一个输不起的人…

Text.jp: What do you think you're doing? Get outta here!
Text.sc: 你觉得你在这做什么？离开这儿！

Text.jp: Mr. Gristleman... a report from the plant says there are dangerous chemicals in your pills.
Text.sc: 吉里斯特曼先生…一份来自植物的报告说，你的药丸有危险化学成分。

Text.jp: So... I didn't know anything about that. I don't want to be a part of this anymore.
Text.sc: 所以…我什么都不知道。我不想再参与这事情了。

Text.jp: Fine! Get lost. And good riddance!
Mr. Gristleman's energy pills are unhealthy and dangerous. Don't risk your health! Regular exercise can make you feel better and give you energy naturally.
Text.sc: 吉里斯特曼先生的能量药丸是不健康，而且危险的。不要用你的健康去冒险！经常运动会让你感觉更好，而且会自然地给予你能量。

Text.jp: I used to be Mr. Gristleman's personal assistant... That was a big mistake. I had no idea he was stuffing his pills with harmful chemicals that can ruin your health!
Text.sc: 我曾经是吉里斯特曼先生的个人助理…那真是个大错误。我不知道他一直将那些有害身体健康的化学物质掺杂进那些药丸中！

Text.jp: Mr. Gristleman? Why don't you come inside and exercise for a little while? I think you'll be surprised.
Text.sc: 吉里斯特曼先生？你为什么不进来，锻炼一会儿呢？我想你会感到惊讶的。

Text.jp: This is amazing! I'm actually... happy! It's been so long since I really felt like smiling. Thank you, Daisy!
Text.sc: 这太惊人了！实际上，我很…开心！这样真正的面带微笑已经还久没有过了。谢谢你，黛西！

Text.jp: I'm sorry, Daisy. Now I can see how wrong I was... I'm going to stop production of those pills immediately and invest in your fitness chain!
Text.sc: 对不起，黛西。现在我才明白自己犯了多大的错误...我会即刻停止这些药丸的生产，并投资在你的健身连锁上！

Text.jp: You can't hire more staff on this level.
Text.sc: 在这一关卡，你无法雇用更多的员工。
能量条 - 恢复满意度。

Text.jp: Extra Chair - Gives you an additional chair.
Text.sc: 额外椅子 - 给你一把额外的椅子。

Text.jp: Boom Box - Speeds up your staff.
Text.sc: 音响 - 给你的员工提速。

Text.jp: Misting Fan - Speeds up all workouts.
Text.sc: 喷雾风扇 - 所有锻炼提速。

Text.jp: Extra Shower - Gives you an additional shower.
Text.sc: 额外淋浴室 - 给你一处额外的淋浴室。

Text.jp: Relaxation Station - Installs another relaxation station.
Text.sc: 放松点 - 再安装一个放松点。

Text.jp: Shop - Earn additional tips from customers.
Text.sc: 商店 - 从顾客那里获得额外的小费。

Text.jp: Device Upgrade - Faster device training speed.
Text.sc: 设备升级 - 设备训练速度更快。

Text.jp: Robot Trainer - A robot trainer to help train clients!
Text.sc: 机器人教练 - 能够帮助训练顾客的机器人教练！

Text.jp: Device Upgrade 2 - Faster device training speed.
Text.sc: 设备升级2 - 设备训练速度更快。
休闲 - 开启休闲模式。
休闲 - 完成休闲模式。
生存 - 开启生存模式。
生存 - 完成生存模式。
机器人维修员 - 修理损坏的设备。

Text.jp: Advertising Robot - Need more clients? This robot is here to help!
Text.sc: 广告机器人 - 需要更多的顾客？这个机器人就可以帮忙。
编号1 - 收集所有星星。
能量条 - 恢复满意度。

Text.jp: Extra Chair - Gives you an additional chair.
Text.sc: 额外椅子 - 给你一把额外的椅子。

Text.jp: Boom Box - Speeds up your staff.
Text.sc: 音响 - 给你的员工提速。

Text.jp: Misting Fan - Speeds up all workouts.
Text.sc: 喷雾风扇 - 所有锻炼提速。

Text.jp: Extra Shower - Gives you an additional shower.
Text.sc: 额外淋浴室 - 给你一处额外的淋浴室。

Text.jp: Relaxation Station - Installs another relaxation station.
Text.sc: 放松点 - 再安装一个放松点。

Text.jp: Shop - Earn additional tips from customers.
Text.sc: 商店 - 从顾客那里获得额外的小费。

Text.jp: Device Upgrade - Faster device training speed.
Text.sc: 设备升级 - 设备训练速度更快。

Text.jp: Robot Trainer - A robot trainer to help train clients!
Text.sc: 机器人教练 - 能够帮助训练顾客的机器人教练！

Text.jp: Device Upgrade 2 - Faster device training speed.
Text.sc: 设备升级2 - 设备训练速度更快。
休闲 - 开启休闲模式。
休闲 - 完成休闲模式。
生存 - 开启生存模式。
生存 - 完成生存模式。
机器人维修员 - 修理损坏的设备。

Text.jp: Advertising Robot - Need more clients? This robot is here to help!
Text.sc: 广告机器人 - 需要更多的顾客？这个机器人就可以帮忙。
编号1 - 收集所有星星。

Text.jp: This is your Star Bar. It shows how many bonus stars you've collected and how many you need to earn your next bonus.
Text.sc: 这是你的星条。其显示了你已收集了多少颗奖励星星，以及你接下来要收集多少奖励。

Text.jp: Collect 240 stars in Story Mode to unlock Survival Mode.
Text.sc: 在故事模式收集240颗星来解锁生存模式。

Text.jp: Collect 220 stars in Story Mode to unlock Relaxed Mode.
Text.sc: 在故事模式收集220颗星来解锁生存模式。

Text.jp: Your game progress will be lost if you exit now. Do you really want to exit the game?
Text.sc: 如果现在退出，你的游戏进度将会丢失。 你确定要退出游戏吗？

Text.jp: Your game progress will be saved if you exit now. Are you sure you want to exit the game?
Text.sc: 如果现在退出，你的游戏进度将会被保存。 你确定要退出游戏吗？

Text.jp: Do you really want to exit the game?
To unlock Relaxed Mode, you need to earn 220 stars in Story Mode.
Text.sc: 要解锁休闲模式，你需要在故事模式中获得220颗星。

Text.jp: To unlock Survival Mode, you need to earn 240 stars in Story Mode.
Text.sc: 要解锁生存模式，你需要在故事模式中获得240颗星。

Text.jp: Thank you for playing Fitness Bustle: Energy Boost. You've successfully finished the trial version. Please fill in the survey link - it will take you under 10 min.
Text.sc: 感谢体验黛西的全民健身计划。你已成功完成了试用版本。请填写调查链接 - 这不会占用你超过10分钟。

Text.jp: All results of Relaxed Mode will be lost. Do you want to continue?
Text.sc: 休闲模式的所有数据将会丢失。要继续吗？

Text.jp: Do you really want to unlock the stage?
Text.sc: 你确定要解锁该剧幕吗？

Text.jp: You can't unlock this stage now!
You need unlock previous stages to unlock this.
Text.sc: 你需要解锁上一个剧幕才能解锁该剧幕。

Text.jp: You need unlock previous stages to unlock this.
Text.sc: 你需要解锁上一个剧幕才能解锁该剧幕。

Text.jp: You can unlock this stage for
Text.sc: 你可以花钱解锁该剧幕

Text.jp: Do you really want to delete this player?
Text.sc: 你确定要删除这名玩家吗？

Text.jp: This name is already in use.
The name cannot consist of only spaces.
Text.sc: 名字不能仅以空格组成。

Text.jp: You've managed to accomplish an impossible task! Congratulations!
Text.sc: 你已成功完成了一项不可思议的任务！恭喜！

Text.jp: Points awarded for completing all tasks.
Text.sc: 完成所有任务所奖励的点数。

Text.jp: Complete the level by this time to earn a Silver Cup.
Text.sc: 到现在完成开卡来赢得银杯。

Text.jp: Complete the level by this time to earn a Gold Cup.
Text.sc: 到现在完成开卡来赢得金杯。

Text.jp: You don't have enough money. This upgrade costs $300.
Text.sc: 你没有足够的钱。该升级需要花费$300。

Text.jp: This product includes portions of the Gogii Games Engine.
Text.sc: This product includes portions of the Gogii Games Engine.

Text.jp: 2013 Big Fish Games, Inc. All rights reserved.
Text.sc: 2013 Big Fish Games, Inc. All rights reserved.

Text.jp: Big Fish Games, and the Big Fish Games logo are trademarks of Big Fish Games, Inc.
Text.sc: Big Fish Games, and the Big Fish Games logo are trademarks of Big Fish Games, Inc.

Text.jp: This profile has been corrupted and will be reset.
Text.sc: 该档案已损坏，将会被重置。
